port_title.description: Tooltip displayed during mouseover on port select box

baud_title.description: Tooltip displayed during mouseover on baud select box

connect.description: Text displayed on the primary connect button

auto_connect_enabled.message: Auto-Connect: Enabled - Configurator automatically tries to connect when new serial port is detected
auto_connect_enabled.description: Tooltip displayed during mouseover on auto_connect checkbox while checked

auto_connect_disabled.message: Auto-Connect: Disabled - User needs to select the correct serial port and click "Connect" button on its own
auto_connect_disabled.description: Tooltip displayed during mouseover on auto_connect checkbox while unchecked

startup_info_message.description: Info message printed on configurator startup running (Operating system, chrome version, configurator version)

error_no_valid_port.message: No serial port selected, please select valid serial port

error_connect_first.message: You can't view this tab at the moment. You need to connect first

error_operation_in_progress.message: You can't do this right now, please wait for current operation to finish

error_cannot_view_tx_tabs_while_connecte.message: You can't view this tab because you are connected to an RX module

error_cannot_connect_while_in_firmware_f.message: You can't connect to a module while you are in Firmware Flasher, please leave firmware flasher before connecting

error_failed_to_open_port.message: Failed to open serial port

error_failed_to_close_port.message: Failed to close serial port

serial_port_opened.message: Serial port successfully opened with ID: $1
